profile-edit.title: Title
profile-edit.changing_access_level_will_update_user_p: Changing access level will update user permissions automatically.
profile-edit.determines_which_data_privacy_regulation: Determines which data privacy regulations apply to this user's activities.
profile-edit.select_your_preferred_language_for_the_i: Select your preferred language for the interface.
profile-edit.full_system_access_including_user_manage: Full system access including user management, all data operations, audit logs, and system configuration.
profile-edit.can_createedit_studies_view_all_data_exp: Can create/edit studies, view all data, export data, manage users, and view audit logs.
profile-edit.can_edit_studies_and_export_data_for_ass: Can edit studies and export data for assigned studies.
profile-edit.can_view_all_data_and_audit_logs_for_qua: Can view all data and audit logs for quality assurance.
profile-edit.can_edit_study_data_but_cannot_export_or: Can edit study data but cannot export or manage users.
